entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Use value semantics for System.Collections.Immutable types #59901
  • [API Proposal]: System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapFilter #59900
  • IEnumerable<T> is defaulted to an empty array during DI resolution #59899
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json serialization callback context #59892

Closed

  • JIT: libraries PGO runtime assert #59668
    7.0.0
  • JIT: a number of OSR stress tests failing with an assert #59785
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add flag to include all intermediate certificates #59898
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Use `IntegralRange` in `fgOptimizeCast` #59897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399785 #59896
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399642 #59893
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399596 #59891
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fallback to x64 directory if running x64 process on win-arm64 apphost #59890
    area-Host
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399475 #59889
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399414 #59888
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399313 #59887
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change loop cloning conditions codegen #59886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix IDE0008 in DllImportGenerator and Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration #59885
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Merged

  • Clean up fix for single-reg returned normalize-on-load vars #59645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix resolveVirtualMethodHelper #59742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize DateTime.Equals #59857
    area-System.Runtime
  • Move runtime rolling builds to run twice a day on main #59884
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move MakeReproPackage logic to a shared location #59796
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make libraries tests use the same config as the matching libraries build. #59867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run wasm aot, wbt tests on windows #59479
    area-Build-mono
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59869
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable Crossgen for FreeBSD, now that it is actually implemented. #59853
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Swap using the provided indexes #55331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
